description: A rustic and romantic setting provides the backdrop for the traditional and creative cuisine served here. It is made from typical local produce with an emphasis on ethical and sustainably produced ingredients (vegan and gluten - free options are also available). Exotic animals inhabit the park, where a stream is home to the house specialities of crayfish, eels and sturgeon. The restaurant also offers a few comfortable guestrooms nearby.
